cmp: 兼 (double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time)
mng: incorruptible, honest, inexpensive, to investigate (old), side wall of a traditional Chinese house (old)

exm.mng: honest, not coercive, honesty, integrity, incorruptible
fig. the price is cheap but the product is beautiful; lit. a bargain buy
honor and shame, sense of honor
Lianjiang county level city in Zhanjiang 湛江[Zhan4 jiang1], Guangdong
